recipe.title: Hard-Cooked Eggs with Cumin, Coarse Salt, and Cayenne
ingredients: 2 tablespoons coarse salt, or to taste
instructions: In a small skillet dry-roast cuminseed and coriander seeds over moderate heat, shaking the skillet, until fragrant, being careful not to burn them. In a mortar with a pestle, an electric spice grinder, or a cleaned coffee grinder grind seeds fine.
Arrange egg halves on a platter and sprinkle with some cumin mixture, salt, and cayenne.
